Description.Name: That's gonna leave a mark...
Description.Details: You storm into the breifing room and slam your datapad down on the table, "What in bloody hell happened down there? Since when do we let a band of bandits holed up in some derelict facilty get the better us?" Nobody dare's meet your gaze. After a few moments of awkward silence, Darius clears his throat, "Uh, Commander, we obviously underestimated this group of bandits. Heck, even the Planetary Government couldn't even find them and..." You interupt him, "Enough excuses. We spent a bit of money getting out here to [[TGT_SYSTEM,{TGT_SYSTEM.Name}]] to retrieve Dark Khaos' Kodiak and we aren't leaving until we have it!" Sumire speaks up, "The Leopard is ready to go." "Boss, we'll need some time to make repairs if you want to use any the mechs from the initial attack run," Yang chimes in. Darius consults his datapad quickly, "Commander, the Planetary Government still want that base captured and are willing to issue another contract to us."

Description.Name: Try Again
Description.Details:
You contemplate things for a few moments before responding, "Alright folks, lets get our asses back down there and show those bandits our true colours!"

As everyone cheers and heads off to make preparations, Darius quickly sends the request to the Planetary Government office to officially submit the contract to the MRBC.

<color=#FF0000>CAPTURE BASE CONTRACT: KHAOS THEORY, ADDED TO COMMAND CENTER </color>
